headline: The Beard Might Stay
abstract: Steven Skybell was finally the right age for Tevye. Little did he know that when the time came, the show would be in Yiddish, and for a surprisingly long run that ended Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Backstage at Joel Grey’s Yiddish-language production of “Fiddler on the Roof,” minutes after its final performance on Sunday night at Stage 42, some actors were already shaving off their beards.
